lore: The first Fiends lived in the Great Pandemonium with Vulcanar. The God of Fire was very satisfied with his creations, but he had no choice but to exile most of them, as they would have eventually wiped out all other creatures in his realm.\n\nWhen a Ferocious Fiend cannot get close enough to bite its enemies, it uses the pointed end of its tail to pierce through them. Some Carvers train young Ferocious Fiends to use them as mounts and shock troops once they grow up.
menagerieDialog: (Oh, Gods, it's eating the floor tiles!)
(This creature is completely out of control, headbutting everything in sight.)
(It curls up next to you and purrs like a cat which is an emotionally confusing experience for you, to say the least.)
(You wish it would close its mouth at some point, but it never does. Ever.)
(It seems to have eaten all your other creatures' food. Maybe it's time to put it down.)
name: Ferocious Fiend
